name: Boulder Bot
description:
Boulder Bot  is a platformer in wich you  collect as much points as possible on your way to the end of the ramp.

There is just one level, I made the game for The Weekly Game Jam.

For better resolution you can download the game.

Inputs:

Move:   

W.A.D or Arrow Keys

or play with Controller
